thread.title: First West Virginia Bancorp, Inc. Announces Cash Dividend

author: cnbc.com
title: First West Virginia Bancorp, Inc. Announces Cash Dividend
text:
WHEELING, W.Va., President and Chief Executive Officer, William G. Petroplus, announced that the Board of Directors of First West Virginia Bancorp, Inc. (OTCQX: FWVB) has declared a quarterly cash dividend of 20 cents per share to be paid to its shareholders for the first quarter of 2018. The dividend will be paid on March 16, 2018 to shareholders of record on March 8, 2018.
First West Virginia Bancorp, Inc. is the parent company of Progressive Bank, N.A., Wheeling, West Virginia.
First West Virginia Bancorp, Inc. stock is traded on the OTCQX marketplace under the symbol "FWVB."
View original content: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/first-west-virginia-bancorp-inc-announces-cash-dividend-300604460.html
SOURCE First West Virginia Bancorp, Inc.
